author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content: A huge stab in the dark but would the silver iodide have produced sepia picks?

author: Phil
content:
Google Calotype

Several articles say it’s paper coated with silver iodide and Britannica says paper coated with silver chloride.

Don’t know which is correct?

author: Willy
content: The photo makes her look like a derelect on a beach some where.
